title: Arizona man dies after taking chloroquine for coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
description: Arizona man dies after taking chloroquine for coronavirus The Globe and Mail Arizona man dies after taking medicine touted by Trump to treat COVID-19 fox2now.com View Full coverage on Google News
content: President Donald Trump speaks about the coronavirus in the James Brady Briefing Room, Monday, March 23, 2020, in Washington. Chloroquine phosphate shares the same active ingredient as malaria drugs that President Trump has touted as possibly effective against… [+2329 chars]
